title: Word recognition meets IDNs
content:
Some choice domain names:

http://www.whorepresents.com/  
http://www.expertsexchange.com/  
http://www.penisland.net/  
http://www.therapistfinder.com/  
 [http://www.molestationnursery.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060110094603/http:/www.molestationnursery.com/)
author: John Hudson

comments.content:
John,

Those are all pretty funny. I knew about PenIsland, but the other ones were new to me. :-)

I guess we need a psychoanalytic theory of eye novements and tokenization in reading, eh?

Even our eye movements and tokenizations are “conceived and born in sin, and subject to all manner of misery, yea to condemnation itself” (to borrow a phrase from the old (Dutch) Christian Reformed form for baptism)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=)

John, those are simply too good!!  
I <cite>must</cite> refer to those in the future!

hhp
